name: John Smith
mission: To explore a new opportunity, and to boldy accomplish tasks that no one has attempted before.

tasks: Oversaw relations with the Klingon Empire
Acted as arbitrator in cases against Starfleet individuals.
Promoted inter-species dialog between the Vulcans and Romulans.
Acted as liaison for Federation citizens visiting Romulus.
Specialized in aiding senior ambassadors in resolving geopolitical and interstellar squabbles.
Oversee second contact with new civilizations.
Successfully completed multiple away missions adhering to all applicable safety protocols.
Replicated the captain's tea as requested.
No red shirt fatalities on missions I commanded.
